overview: It’s the very best days of their lives – and no fuckin’ wonder! With an array of hard cocks, heavy balls and insatiable libidos it’s very much a case of living the sexual dream for this class of oversexed students, whose love of dick and sweet raw ass-holes make them the perfect antidote to educational fatigue. Dick Casey, Kris Wallace and the legendary Johan Volny provide the perfect tonic for anyone who thinks school life is staid; as a bevy of jizz-jerkin’ scholars abandon their books in favour of a practical exploration of the male anatomy ...
title: School's Out
